org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud
Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud.Cloud

public class Cloud
extends Object

Cloud domain object. Includes all of the details required for the cloud driver to use a cloud provider.

Author:
barakme

validateDynamicNodesClosures

public void validateDynamicNodesClosures(org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.DSLValidationContext validationContext)
                                  throws org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.DSLValidationException
Validations for dynamic-byon cloud only. Validates that each template contains startMachine and stopMachine closures in its custom closure. Validates that the management machine's template contains the startManagementMachines closure in its custom closure.

Parameters:
validationContext - .
Throws:
org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.DSLValidationException - .

normalizeCifsPath

public static String normalizeCifsPath(String path)
Given a path of the type /C$/PATH - indicating an absolute CIFS path, returns /PATH. If the string does not match, returns the original unmodified string.

Parameters:
path - the input path.
Returns:
the input path, adjusted to remove the CIFS drive letter, if it exists, or the original path if the drive letter is not present.
